content.query:
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://ivsdatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/synapse/ivs-synapse-dldb/Party/',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows;

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.Party_delta AS
SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET( BULK 'https://ivsdatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/synapse/ivs-synapse-dldb/Party/', 
FORMAT = 'delta') as r

select * from dbo.Party_delta
